title: Indian student shot dead in US: Killed by 'miscreants'; was working at gas station
content: A 26-year-old Hyderabad student, Chandrashekar Pole, was tragically shot dead by an unidentified gunman at a Dallas gas station where he worked part-time. Pole had moved to the US in 2023 for higher studies, completing his master's degree six months ago. BRS MLA T Harish Rao met the bereaved family and demanded that the Telangana government make arrangements to bring Pole’s mortal remains back to his hometown.

title: UK PM to visit India: Focus on 'Vision 2035'; Starmer's 1st official trip
content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer will visit India on October 8-9, 2025, at PM Modi's invitation for his first official trip. The leaders will review the India-UK Comprehensive Strategic Partnership under 'Vision 2035' and attend Mumbai's Global Fintech Fest.

title: Pak buckles in PoK: Sharif govt, protesters sign pact - what's in the deal?
content: Protests in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir concluded after an agreement. The Pakistan government and protestors signed a 25-point charter. This followed days of violence and unrest in the region. The deal includes compensation for victims and significant developmental measures. Key provisions cover education, health, and electricity improvements. Administrative reforms and infrastructure projects are also part of the agreement.

title: Bulldozers roll in Bareilly: House linked to Raza sealed; 'Raja Palace' demolished
content: Bareilly authorities conducted demolition and anti-encroachment drives following recent clashes. Raza Palace, a marriage hall, was demolished for building norm violations, and a house allegedly sheltering Maulana Tauqeer Raza during the violence was sealed. Unauthorized shop and house extensions were also removed in Sailani.

title: 'Trying to steal Jan Nayak title': PM slams Rahul; blames RJD for Bihar's woes
content: Prime Minister Modi inaugurated significant education and skilling projects in Bihar, including the Jan Nayak Karpoori Thakur Skill University. He subtly criticized Rahul Gandhi over the 'Jan Nayak' title and launched PM-SETU worth Rs 60,000 crore, alongside other youth-centric initiatives, while blaming previous RJD rule for educational woes.

title: US govt shuts down: Embassy in India gives update; scheduled services will..
content: The US government has shut down for the first time in nearly seven years after Republicans and Democrats failed to agree on federal funding. Despite this, the US Embassy in India confirmed that scheduled visa and passport services will continue. The embassy's X account will only provide urgent safety and security updates during this period.

title: India's ODI squad: Gill named captain; end of the road for Shami and Jadeja?
content: Shubman Gill has been appointed India's new ODI captain for the upcoming series against Australia, with Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli included in the squad. However, Ravindra Jadeja and Mohammed Shami appear to be excluded, signaling a potential end to their ODI careers. The article also details the full ODI and T20I squads and the series schedule.

title: Pak woos US: After rare earth & crypto, Munir offers port deal to Trump
content: Advisers to Pakistan’s military chief proposed a $1.2 billion port at Pasni to US officials, aiming to transport critical minerals and offer Washington a strategic presence. This initiative, part of a broader effort to strengthen ties with the Trump administration, seeks to diversify Pakistan's options and counterbalance China's influence.

title: US Army warns: Military network at ‘very high risk’; sends memo to these companies
content: The US Army's chief technology officer issued a memo labeling the new NGC2 battlefield communications network, developed by Palantir and Anduril, as "very high risk" due to fundamental security flaws. Concerns include uncontrolled data access, unmonitored user actions, and unverified software security, potentially allowing adversaries persistent access and misuse of classified information.

title: Russia-Pak arms deal: Congress hits out at PM - ‘failure of personalised diplomacy’
content: The Congress party criticized the Modi government's foreign policy after Russia proceeded with supplying advanced jet engines to Pakistan's JF-17 fighter aircraft, despite India's objections. This move highlights the perceived failure of "personalised diplomacy" and India's inability to diplomatically isolate Pakistan, even as Moscow remains a key defence partner for New Delhi.

title: 'Putting pressure on me': Jadeja laughs off record chase; Kapil milestone in sight
content: Ravindra Jadeja delivered a stellar all-round performance in India's dominant win against West Indies, scoring an unbeaten century and taking four wickets to secure the Player of the Match award. He humbly addressed comparisons to Kapil Dev's legendary record, emphasising his focus on fitness and enjoying the game. India clinched an innings and 140-run victory, leading the series 1-0.

title: Taylor Swift drops wedding hint while talking about Travis Kelce on TV show
content: Taylor Swift gave a rare wedding update about her engagement to Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce while promoting The Life of a Showgirl on “The Graham Norton Show.” The pop icon joked about inviting Graham Norton, hinted at a large celebration, and showed off her massive diamond ring, sparking viral fan reactions, especially to Cillian Murphy’s cool response.

title: H-1B visa fee hike: Lawsuit filed against Trump's order; 4 biggest complaints
content: A coalition of labor unions, healthcare providers, and schools has filed a lawsuit against President Trump's executive order imposing a $100,000 fee increase on H-1B visa applications. They claim this unconstitutional "anti-immigration power grab" defies Congress, harms communities, and undermines the U.S. economy.

title: Protests & cameras: Flotilla ships failed to reach Gaza but won global attention - Here's how
content: The Global Sumud Flotilla, attempting to breach Israel's Gaza blockade, was intercepted by Israeli soldiers, but generated unprecedented global attention. Leveraging real-time tracking, social media, and high-profile participants like Greta Thunberg, the mission drew millions of online viewers and sparked international protests, creating a significant cultural and political impact worldwide.

title: J&K: Farooq Abdullah hospitalised in Srinagar; suffering from abdominal infection
content: Former Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Farooq Abdullah was admitted to a private hospital in Srinagar after developing an abdominal infection earlier this week. National Conference leaders confirmed his condition is now improving significantly. He had been unwell for several days but is expected to be discharged either later today or by tomorrow, according to party sources.

title: Ind vs Aus: Harbhajan questions Rohit's removal as ODI captain; expresses 'disappointment'
content: Harbhajan Singh lauds Shubman Gill’s new ODI captaincy but voices disappointment over Rohit Sharma being replaced, emphasizing his experience and pivotal role in white-ball cricket.

title: Arthur Jones cause of death: How did the Ravens’ Super Bowl champion die at 39
content: Former NFL star and Super Bowl champion Arthur Jones died suddenly at 39, with his cause of death unconfirmed. A key defensive player in the Baltimore Ravens' Super Bowl XLVII victory, his passing deeply saddened the sports world. Jones, from a renowned athletic family, is remembered for his positive spirit and legacy.

title: Giants star Malik Nabers slams 'broken justice system' LSU teammate's tragic death
content: Giants rookie Malik Nabers expressed anguish over former LSU teammate Kyren Lacy's tragic death by suicide, which occurred a day before a grand jury hearing. Lacy faced negligent homicide charges, but his attorney claimed new evidence showed innocence. Nabers criticized the justice system and media for destroying reputations before facts are known.

title: Stephen A. Smith on Shedeur Sanders’ 'silence' amid Browns QB drama
content: Shedeur Sanders made headlines in Cleveland on October 1, 2025. He remained silent during a press conference. Stephen A. Smith defended his actions, calling judgment unfair. Cam Newton discussed Sanders' brand value for the Browns. Both analysts agreed his true test would come only when he steps onto the field.

title: 'Second-best after Dhoni': Sehwag lauds Rohit; Mumbai batter removed as ODI skipper
content: Indian selectors have replaced Rohit Sharma with Shubman Gill as ODI captain for the upcoming Australia series, signaling long-term preparations for the 2027 World Cup. Despite the leadership change, Rohit remains in the squad, with cricketing legends praising his tactical acumen and ability to foster team unity, highlighting his continued importance to Team India.

title: Ray of hope for advanced breast cancer patients: US approves new oral drug Inluriyo
content: The FDA has approved Inluriyo, a first-in-class oral therapy for ESR1-mutated advanced breast cancer, marking a significant breakthrough. This new drug targets hormone-resistant tumors by blocking estrogen receptors, reducing the risk of disease progression or death by 33-38%. Inluriyo offers a convenient pill alternative, bringing new hope to patients.

title: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli fit and key for India: Ajit Agarkar
content: BCCI chief selector Ajit Agarkar confirmed Shubman Gill as India's new ODI captain, consolidating leadership across formats. Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will remain key players for the Australia tour, having passed fitness tests, despite playing only one format. Rohit is expected to open with Gill, balancing experience with fresh leadership.

title: Jeff Bezos makes bold prediction: 'The next data centres will be built in space'
content: Jeff Bezos predicts space-based data centers within 10-20 years, leveraging uninterrupted solar power for unmatched efficiency. These orbital facilities would revolutionize AI training and cloud computing, overcoming terrestrial limitations. He believes technological advances will make them feasible despite high costs, comparing AI's boom to the internet's early surge.

title: 'Practically impossible to avoid': Agarkar on Gill taking over ODI reins from Rohit
content: Shubman Gill has been named India's ODI captain, replacing Rohit Sharma, as part of a strategic move to consolidate leadership across formats. Chief selector Ajit Agarkar cited long-term planning for the 2027 World Cup and the impracticality of having three different captains. Gill, already Test captain, also serve as T20I vice-captain under Suryakumar Yadav.

title: Monk robes to veg food: Delhi 'godman' makes demands in jail; charges added to FIR
content: Self-styled godman Swami Chaitanyananda was remanded to 14 days judicial custody by a Delhi court over sexual harassment allegations at a management institute. Police added a charge for threatening a woman after the case was registered. His counsel sought preservation of evidence and specific provisions for his stay, on which the court sought police response.

title: Emma Raducanu’s IG nod to Taylor Swift’s ‘The Life of a Showgirl’
content: Emma Raducanu publicly supported Taylor Swift's new album, "The Life of a Showgirl," on Instagram on October 3, 2025, amidst its mixed reception. This gesture followed Raducanu's mixed 2025 tennis season, which included recent losses but also a strong semifinal performance. Her musical interests connect her with fans beyond the court.

title: Bihar polls by Oct-end? EC holds all-party meet; suggestions on dates, phases
content: The Election Commission met political parties on Saturday. They discussed Bihar assembly polls. Parties urged polls after the Chhath festival. They also asked for fewer phases. Reforms like voter cap and Form 17C were welcomed. Janata Dal (United) sought a single-phase election. BJP asked agents to collect Form 17C. Election dates will be announced soon.

title: ‘Op Gaanjaney’: How ATS tracked ex-NSG commando in 200kg drug bust; kingpin had political ambitions
content: Rajasthan ATS apprehended former NSG commando Bajrang Singh, wanted in a 200kg ganja smuggling case. Singh, who served in the 26/11 Mumbai operation and retired in 2021, became a narcotics kingpin, leveraging local connections after failed political ambitions. He was tracked for two months using technical intelligence and informers, culminating in his arrest under 'Operation Gaanjaney'.

title: First major legal challenge hits Trump’s $100K H-1B visa overhaul - Here’s what to know
content: A coalition of unions, educators, and advocacy groups has filed the first major lawsuit against President Trump’s $100,000 H-1B visa fee, calling it unlawful and harmful to US industries. Filed in California federal court, the case challenges presidential authority, citing risks to innovation, healthcare, and education. The outcome could reshape immigration policy and global talent flow.

title: Sean Combs case: Meet Arun Subramanian? Indian-origin judge who sentenced ‘Diddy’ to 4 yrs in jail
content: District Judge Arun Subramanian sentenced Sean “Diddy” Combs to 50 months in prison and a $500,000 fine for prostitution-related offenses, citing his history of violence. Subramanian, a 45-year-old Indian-origin judge appointed by President Biden, earned praise for his measured yet firm handling of the high-profile trial, maintaining decorum amidst intense public scrutiny.

title: Maoists must surrender by March 2026, says Amit Shah in Chhattisgarh
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah has set a firm March 2026 deadline for Maoists to surrender, stating talks will only be considered after they lay down arms. He warned of intensified operations if they fail to comply, emphasizing Bastar's desire for peace and development.

title: Cough syrup row: Tests confirm presence of poisonous chemical; MP bans sale of 'Coldrif'
content: Seven children in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara district died from consuming Coldrif cough syrup, confirmed to contain the toxic industrial chemical diethylene glycol (DEG). Following Tamil Nadu lab test results, the Madhya Pradesh government banned Coldrif and all products by Sresan Pharmaceuticals, ordering immediate statewide seizure of stocks.

title: 'Roots infested with insects': PM slams Congress-RJD for Bihar's 'migration crisis'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi criticised previous RJD-Congress governments for Bihar's education system devastation and mass migration, crediting CM Nitish Kumar and the NDA for its revival. He highlighted 10 lakh new government jobs, a significantly increased education budget, and launched youth-oriented projects worth over ₹62,000 crore, including a new skill university and revamped student schemes.

title: Japan to get first woman PM: Sanae Takaichi elected LDP leader; known for hard-line China stance
content: Sanae Takaichi was elected leader of Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party. She is now the most likely candidate to become Japan's first female prime minister. Takaichi defeated Shinjiro Koizumi in a runoff vote. She replaces Shigeru Ishiba. Takaichi served under Shinzo Abe. She shares his nationalist views and seeks military modernisation.

title: US shutdown: Military families seek food aid as WH warns of wider impact
content: The US government shutdown continues for a third day. Military families face financial anxiety and seek food assistance. White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt highlights impacts on 1.3 million service members unpaid. WIC programs and air traffic controllers also face jeopardy. The shutdown could cost the US economy billions weekly. Lawmakers have not reached a resolution.

title: 'Demanding Rs 30k maintenance on Rs 12k salary': Man brutally beaten by in-laws
content: Kunal, who married against his in-laws' wishes, was brutally assaulted in Sonipat by his wife's father, uncle, and associates. His arms and legs were broken after he posted marriage photos online, which angered the family who had allegedly arranged her second marriage. Police registered an FIR, and Kunal is undergoing treatment.

title: Hostage release but ... : Hamas agrees to Trump’s Gaza peace plan with conditions - What are they?
content: Hamas partially accepted Donald Trump's Gaza peace plan, agreeing to release all Israeli hostages if conditions are met. However, the group seeks further negotiations on crucial clauses concerning Gaza's future governance, Israeli withdrawal, and its own role. Trump urged Israel to halt bombing for hostage release, while warning of severe consequences if the deal ultimately fails.

title: 'Why would he visit at night?': Dalit man wanting to go to temple assaulted; FIR filed
content: A Dalit labourer was allegedly assaulted and threatened in Himatnagar after expressing a wish to visit a temple. Upon showing his Aadhaar card, an accused subjected him to casteist slurs and physical abuse, questioning his presence as a Dalit. He was later driven away and warned against returning, prompting an FIR under the SC/ST (Prevention of Atrocities) Act.

title: ‘Jabo de’: Bandmate recalls Zubeen Garg’s final moments; alleges he was frothing at mouth
content: Singer Zubeen Garg died under mysterious circumstances. His manager Siddharth Sharma faces arrest. Witnesses allege poisoning and criminal conspiracy. Sharma reportedly dismissed symptoms during Garg's final moments. He allegedly controlled the yacht and supplied liquor. Other statements corroborate Sharma's actions. Financial records and witness accounts establish culpability. Police now treat this as a premeditated murder.

title: 'Confiscate diplomatic passport': Nishikant hits out at Rahul over Colombia speech
content: BJP MP Nishikant Dubey demanded the confiscation of Rahul Gandhi's diplomatic passport and legal action, following Gandhi's criticism of the Indian government's "attack on Indian democracy" during a visit to Colombia. Dubey compared Gandhi's "baseless statements" to controversial figures, also slamming Congress for opposing climate activist Sonam Wangchuk's NSA arrest and recalling the party's historical actions during the Emergency.

title: U'khand: 22-yr-old merchant navy’s senior deck cadet goes missing at sea; search ops on
content: A 22-year-old senior deck cadet, Karandeep Singh Rana, went missing from a merchant navy vessel. The ship was traveling from Iraq to China via Sri Lanka and Singapore. His family last contacted him on September 20. The shipping company confirmed his disappearance overboard. A 96-hour search operation was conducted. The vessel is now heading to China for a full investigation.

title: US firm fires Indian staff in 4 minutes; offers 8 coping tips for layoffs
content: A US-based company recently laid off its Indian workforce in just four minutes during a virtual meeting, leaving employees shocked and unprepared. Beyond the financial impact, the emotional toll was severe. The focus is on the human side of sudden layoffs and eight practical coping strategies including financial planning, career rebuilding, and mental well-being to help professionals manage unexpected job loss.

title: Kidney transplant breakthrough: Scientists create universal donor kidney
content: Scientists converted a type A kidney into a type O universal donor kidney. Enzymes removed specific antigens from the organ. The converted kidney worked normally for two days in a brain-dead patient. Antigens then reappeared. This research shows a path to reduce kidney transplant waiting times. It could benefit many type O patients.

title: Critiques from former players and Dabo himself: Can Clemson change the narrative?
content: Frustrations are high at Clemson. Dabo Swinney and former players aren't shying away from the issues.

title: Schlittler: Fan heckling of family 'crossed the line'
content: Yankees starter Cam Schlittler said Red Sox fans "crossed the line" by harassing family members, including his mother, on social media ahead of his Game 3 start in the AL Wild Card Series.

title: Boone fires back at Jays broadcaster: 'He's wrong'
content: The Yankees landed in Toronto with some bulletin board material ahead of the ALDS, courtesy of Blue Jays television color analyst and former major leaguer Buck Martinez.

title: Source: UNC tabs QB Johnson with Lopez ailing
content: North Carolina is turning to senior quarterback Max Johnson to start against Clemson as Gio Lopez is dealing with a lower-body injury, a source told ESPN.

title: Hammon's words prescient as bench carries Aces
content: Dana Evans (21 points) led an Aces bench that outscored the Mercury's reserves 41-16 en route to an 89-86 win in Game 1 of the WNBA Finals.

title: Engelbert vows to 'do better,' denies Clark remark
content: WNBA commissioner Cathy Engelbert said there were "inaccuracies" in some of the comments attributed to her by Napheesa Collier earlier this week but acknowledged she has to "do better" in growing her relationship with players.

title: Sources: Wisconsin QB Edwards out vs. Michigan
content: Wisconsin will be without starting quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. and starting center Jake Renfro at Michigan on Saturday, sources told ESPN.

title: Bronny cold in debut, but Redick praises growth
content: Bronny James struggled through a 1-for-12 shooting performance in his preseason debut, but Lakers coach JJ Redick said he is "a totally different player than he was a year ago."

title: Ex-Ravens, Syracuse DL Arthur Jones dies at 39
content: Arthur Jones, a defensive lineman who spent his first four NFL seasons in Baltimore and won a Super Bowl with the Ravens, has died. He was 39.

title: 🤞🏽 Can Purdue end Swift album drop 'curse'?
content: Purdue is 4-11 in its first game after a Taylor Swift album drops -- and 0-10 when that game falls within seven days of a release.

title: The Blue Jays' playoff run starts with the AL's top seed -- and a modern Mr. October on their side
content: After George Springer's career rebirth powered Toronto to the top of the AL East, he has a clear goal for the MLB postseason ahead.

title: Cramming for NFL Week 5: Five fantasy sleepers, three predictions, three trends and an intriguing bet
content: Will the Giants' receivers step up? More success coming for Woody Marks? A lot of points expected in Raiders-Colts? Here's last-minute intel for Week 5.

title: How did the Browns decide on starting QB No. 41? Inside their 'intentional' methods
content: The quarterbacks room has been developed to give Dillon Gabriel (named Sunday's starter) and Shedeur Sanders space to grow.

title: Wetzel: Collier comments reflect WNBA's core problem: How it sees Caitlin Clark
content: In seeming to not embrace the player who singlehandedly lifted the WNBA, the league risks losing her fan base.

title: Marner in Vegas, Sullivan in New York and Crosby ... on the move? Guide to the NHL season
content: Miss anything the past few months? Miss everything? Get caught up here before opening night on Tuesday.

title: College football recruiting intel: Could we see big flips? Which classes could rise?
content: Are Florida recruits wavering? Could we see some five-star flips? We look at where the classes and top prospects stand.

title: Paolo Banchero, Trae Young: Breaking down 10 names that could define NBA season
content: ESPN's Tim Bontemps breaks down players and personnel that will play major roles on the court and beyond.

title: Last-minute pickups for Week 5: Jaxson Dart, Brenton Strange among top options
content: With many quality fantasy starters on byes this week, we have options at each position to fill in for you.

title: 'Two Hall of Fame quarterbacks just battling it out': A mini-oral history of 2015 Superdome Duel
content: With the Saints hosting the Giants on Sunday, we asked those who were there to recall the teams' epic 52-49 game.

title: 📈 Ranking all 68 Power 4 QBs: A surprise No. 1
content: What have we learned about the signal-callers so far? Here's where Arch Manning, Beau Pribula and others stand.

title: 🩺 Tyreek Hill injury timeline, impact on Fins
content: What is the Dolphins WR's outlook for a dislocated knee, the on-field impact of his absence and his future in Miami.

title: 👊 MMA stars rank Hollywood actors as fighters
content: ESPN assembled a panel of MMA experts to determine which Hollywood stars would win a UFC-style event.

title: 🏆 Barnwell's NFL quarter-season awards
content: Can Josh Allen win another MVP? Could anyone edge Myles Garrett for DPOY? We ranked the top three candidates to win seven NFL awards through four weeks.

title: ⛳ Ryder envelope rule must change, Bradley says
content: U.S. captain Keegan Bradley said the Ryder Cup's longstanding envelope rule involving injured players should change, but European counterpart Luke Donald said it's there to protect players and should remain in place.

title: 🗣️ Players support Collier in ripping WNBA
content: Players across the WNBA supported Napheesa Collier after she ripped WNBA leadership in her exit interview Tuesday.

title: 💰 Sources: Big Ten mulling $2B capital deal
content: The Big Ten is in talks about a private capital deal, which includes a 10-year grant of rights extension through 2046, that would infuse at least $2 billion into the league and its schools, sources told ESPN.

title: 🏈 Colts CB Howard abruptly retires
content: Veteran cornerback Xavien Howard, 32, informed the Colts of his decision to retire just days after his much-criticized performance against the Rams.

title: Man United need to face reality: Amorim is not the club's biggest issue
content: Man United's decision-making is driven by the idea of where they think they ought to be, not where they are.

title: Man United draw vs. champions Chelsea signals power shift
content: Chelsea have dominated the WSL for six seasons, but Friday showed the Blues' grip on the league is weakening.

title: How The Rock transformed his body -- and mind -- into Mark Kerr
content: Becoming Mark Kerr, a 6-foot-3, 260-pound ex-MMA fighter, included a process unlike any other during Johnson's acting career.

title: Christian Horner's F1 return: Where next after Red Bull exit?
content: With Christian Horner now free to return to Formula 1 in 2026, speculation about his next landing spot is rife - ESPN ranks the likelihood of his options.

title: Phillies' 9-9-9 Challenge box for 2025 postseason to feature 'fun size' hot dogs
content: The Phillies' Challenge box will offer "fun size" hot dogs and "petite" beers, as well as a built-in scoreboard for fans to track their progress.

title: Tottenham takeover: Top scenes from Vikings-Browns in London
content: The NFL went international in Week 5. Here's how Minnesota and Cleveland made the trip worth remembering in London.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi clubs set to bid for Man Utd's Bruno in January
content: Saudi Pro League could come back in for Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes in January. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Eric Karabell's 'Do not draft' list, including LaMelo Ball, Ja Morant, Joel Embiid
content: Eric Karabell highlights the players to fade at their current average draft position in fantasy basketball drafts.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Fantasy hockey cheat sheet: The names you need to know when you draft your team
content: The fantasy hockey cheat sheet has everything you need to prepare for the draft on one printable PDF.

title: Give me a reason to draft this guy! Late-round picks
content: When you're in the late rounds of your draft, here are the players you should look at and the key reason why.

title: Three arrested in two-year-old murder case in Sri Sathya Sai district
content: Amarnath was murdered after he allegedly blackmailed his friend’s wife over an objectionable video, say police

title: UDF demands Vasavan and Prasanth’s resignation over “misappropriation” of gold-plated panels from Sabarimala
content: BJP leader P.K. Krishnadas says thousands of Ayyappa devotees will lay siege to Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan’s official residence on Tuesday to press their demand for a CBI inquiry

title: BJP core group meets in Jammu ahead of Rajya Sabha polls
content: The Election Commission of India announced on September 25 that the elections for the four Rajya Sabha seats in the Union Territory would be held on October 24, more than four years after they fell vacant

title: Delegation of Samajwadi Party leaders led by Uttar Pradesh LoP 'stopped' from leaving for violence-hit Bareilly
content: Referring to protests in the city last week, LoP Mata Prasad Pandey claimed that the Muslim community only wanted to give a letter to the authorities, but police resorted to excessive force against them

title: Congress slams NDA govt. over new Adani power plant project in Bihar
content: Party leader Kanhaiya Kumar criticises the govt. for ‘handing over’ 1,000 acres of land to the Adani Group at a very low price

title: Withdraw GR on Kunbi certificates: OBC outfits at meeting chaired by CM Fadnavis
content: The united OBC community protest march on October 10 will go ahead as planned,” Congress Legislature Party (CLP) leader Vijay Wadettiwar said

title: Number of deleted votes in some constituencies of Bihar exceeds victory margins of last Assembly elections, alleges Congress
content: Election Commission should act on reports of irregularities impartially and not function as the BJP’s B-team, says Jairam Ramesh

title: Women’s Blind Football World Cup to get under way in Kochi on October 5
content: Defending champions Argentina, host India, Brazil, England, Poland, Turkey, Canada, and Japan to participate in the championship

title: U.K. Prime Minister Starmer to visit India from October 8
content: The two leaders will also be attending the 6th edition of the Global Fintech Fest in Mumbai and deliver keynote addresses

title: TDB dismisses misappropriation of gold, calls for probe
content: Alleging deliberate attempts to malign both TDB and sanctity of the Sabarimala temple, the board has decided to approach the High Court seeking a comprehensive probe

title: 2,90,669 in State to benefit from new scheme launched for auto drivers: R&B Minister
content: Annual financial assistance amount has been increased to ₹15,000 from the previous government’s ₹10,000, says Janardhan Reddy

title: Vedan’s song in Calicut University syllabus: Board of Studies dismisses expert’s suggestions
content: Academic M.M. Basheer had suggested against the inclusion of songs by rapper Vedan and singer Gowry Lekshmi in the third semester B.A. Malayalam syllabus

title: Ernakulam tops district-wise list of NDPS cases
content: The Excise department registers 1,105 drug-related offences till August 2025, marking a 10% rise over last year’s total

title: Congress slams the BJP for targeting Rahul Gandhi, calls it ‘hypocrisy’
content: ‘Our democratic system being hijacked is a matter that has brought us disrepute across the world, courtesy the BJP itself,’ senior Congress leader K.C. Venugopal said in a social media post

title: More women join the labour force, but are they really employed?
content: In rural areas, it is difficult to separate women’s domestic responsibilities from their role as helpers in household enterprises

title: Chennithala demands resignation of Minister, calls for probe into Sabarimala gold-plating scandal
content: Congress leader says all developments at Sabarimala since 2019 have been in violation of court orders

title: Egypt Reopens Tomb Of Amenhotep III For Public After 20 Years Of Renovation
content: Egypt on Saturday opened a tomb of a pharaoh for visitors after more than two decades of renovation in the southern city of Luxor, as it prepares for the official opening of the Grand Egyptian Museum in Cairo.

title: Parties Urge Poll Body To Conduct Bihar Elections Immediately After Chhath
content: The Election Commission of India (ECI) on Saturday reviewed preparations for the upcoming Bihar Assembly elections during the first day of its two-day visit to the state.

title: Israeli Army Will Advance Preparations For First Phase Of Trump's Gaza Peace Plan
content: Israel's army said Saturday that it would advance preparations for the first phase of US President Donald Trump's plan to end the war in Gaza and return all the remaining hostages.

title: After Sena Leader's Comment On Balasaheb's Death, A Defamation Threat
content: The political slugfest between Shiv Sena UBT and Shinde Shiv Sena has intensified days after senior leader Ramdas Kadam's explosive remarks at the Dussehra rally over the death of party founder Balasaheb Thackeray.

title: UP Man jumps Into Yamuna With 4 Children After Wife Elopes: Police
content: A man, along with his four children, allegedly jumped into the Yamuna River here after his wife eloped with another man, police said on Saturday.

title: Legal System Governed By Rule Of Law, Not Rule Of Bulldozer: Chief Justice
content: Chief Justice of India B R Gavai on Friday said the Indian legal system is governed by rule of law and not by "rule of the bulldozer".

title: Indian Dental Student, Working Part-Time At US Gas Station, Shot Dead
content: A 27-year-old Indian student has reportedly been shot dead in Dallas, US. Chandrashekar Pole, who was from Hyderabad, was working part-time at a gas station last night when he was killed by an unidentified gunman.

title: 3-Year-Old Girl Killed As Truck Rams Motorcycle In Haryana: Cops
content: A three-year-old girl, who was riding on a motorcycle with her parents, was killed after being crushed under the tyre of a truck which hit the two-wheeler in Haryana's Ambala, police said on Saturday.

title: IndiGo Tops Market Share And Punctuality, FlyBig Sees Most Cancellations
content: IndiGo airlines has the largest market share in the country's civil aviation sector at 64.2 per cent, followed by Air India at 27.3 per cent, a report by the regulator DGCA said.

title: Ambulance Drivers Questioned Over Stampede At Actor Vijay's Rally In Karur
content: Ambulance drivers who were on duty during the actor-politician Vijay's election rally in Karur on September 27, were interrogated on Saturday, police said.

title: "Savage": Zelensky Says Russian Drone Strike On Ukraine Train Station Kills 30
content: A Russian drone strike on a railway station in the northeastern Ukrainian region of Sumy wounded at least 30 people, President Volodymyr Zelensky said Saturday.

title: Woman Goes Into Labour On Train, Delivers Baby At Ambala Railway Station
content: A woman went into labour during a train journey and delivered a healthy baby girl at the Ambala railway station, officials said on Saturday.

title: 20% Cow Cess On Liquor? Rajasthan Bar Bill Goes Viral
content: A customer was recently charged 20% extra on the value-added tax (VAT) for beer at a bar in Jodhpur. This additional amount was 'cow cess', a tax aimed at supporting cows and cow shelters in Rajasthan.

title: Assam CID Hands Over Zubeen Garg's Autopsy Report To Wife
content: Authorities in Assam on Saturday handed over the second autopsy report of singer Zubeen Garg to his wife, Garima Saikia Garg, as the state's Crime Investigation Department (CID) intensified its probe into the circumstances surrounding his death.

title: 'Marital Quarrels Don't Amount To Suicide Abetment': Allahabad High Court
content: The Allahabad High Court, in an order in an abetment to suicide case in Uttar Pradesh, has observed that marital discord and domestic disputes are quite common, and if a spouse commits suicide for this reason, it cannot be considered as abetment.

title: Family Cremates Another Man After Bodies' Mix Up At Delhi Hospital
content: The two bodies were mixed up, because of which, one of them was cremated by a family mistaking it for their relative's.

title: BJP Reaches Out To Vijay Days After Stampede With An Advice: Sources
content: The BJP has reached out to South superstar Vijay's party days after the Karur stampede, said sources, hinting that the saffron party is working to utilise the actor's massive fan base to improve its chances in the 2026 Tamil Nadu assembly elections.

title: FBI Chief Kash Patel Fires Trainee For Displaying Pride Flag At Workplace
content: FBI Director Kash Patel dismissed a bureau trainee on Wednesday, October 1, for previously displaying a Pride flag at his workstation, according to sources cited by CNN.

title: Explained: What Is Diethylene Glycol Found In 'Coldrif' Cough Syrup At Tamil Nadu Unit
content: Diethylene Glycol (DEG) and Ethylene Glycol (EG) are industrial solvents used in antifreeze, paints, brake fluids, and plastics.

title: Irregularities In Sabarimala Temple's Gold Plating Sparks Political Row
content: The controversy over alleged irregularities in the gold plating of the Sabarimala temple sanctum has snowballed into a political issue, as the Travancore Devaswom Board said there were no lapses, while the Pandalam Palace demanded an investigation.

title: Gold-plated door repair at Sabarimala faces roadblock amid mercury ban, scandal concerns
content: Forest department has informed TDB that no permission will be granted to bring mercury to the hillock, which lies within a tiger reserve. TDB  unlikely to seek permission to transport the doors outside the hillock for repair, given the sensitivities involved

title: Russia’s decision to supply JF-17 jet engines to Pakistan a failure of PM’s personalised diplomacy, says Congress
content: Congress general secretary (communications) Jairam Ramesh says multiple news reports suggest that this deal is moving forward despite direct interventions by External Affairs Minister S. Jaishankar in June this year

title: Data show Punjab farm fires fell by 70% in 2024, yet the more accurate measure of total ‘burnt area’ rose
content: Avoidance of satellites as they pass; and technical issues in counting fires could result in under-reporting and little change on the ground, despite claims of success by the Central and State governments; reliable data and solutions that work for farmers are still needed, say experts

title: Manohar Parrikar’s 2017 letter advised against making any change in the organisational structure of BrahMos Thiruvananthapuram unit
content: With reference to a reported move to delink BATL from BAPL, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh recently wrote to Shashi Tharoor, MP, that the ‘transfer’ is in line with the March 2007 order of Kerala govt. handing over KELTEC to DRDO. However, the order was amended in October that year handing over KELTEC to BAPL, the parent company of BATL, a point not mentioned in Singh’s letter. Parikkar’s 2017 letter takes note of this fact

title: A renewed public interest in Mrithasanjeevani
content: Kerala, which used to be in 12th place in the National Organ Donors’ Registry two months ago, suddenly improved its position to the 10th place, with 8,529 persons pledging their organs.

title: Union Minister Gadkari seeks modernisation in air traffic control, aviation sector
content: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari emphasises the need for a global standard in technology and rules in aviation sector.

title: Congress slams 'politics of harassment, oppression' in PoK
content: At least 10 people were killed and many injured in clashes between protesters and security forces in PoK in the last few days

title: Hyderabad student shot dead at gas station in Texas
content: Expressing grief, Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy said that all possible assistance will be provided in bringing Chandrashekar’s mortal remains to his hometown

title: Jammu and Kashmir police attach property of The Resistance Front ‘commander’ under UAPA in Srinagar
content: Though the property is registered in the name of the terrorist’s father, investigation has revealed that Gul is an active stakeholder, a police spokesperson said

title: Passenger rescued after jumping on Bengaluru metro track at Majestic station
content: The incident occurred around 3.17 p.m. when a man jumped in front of a train bound for Madhavara on the Green Line.

title: Gaps in brain death certification contribute to low deceased organ donation rates in India: experts
content: Highlighting the findings of a national survey, conducted over three months among physicians involved in organ donations, Deepak Gupta, professor of neurosurgery at AIIMS, Delhi, who led the team conducting the survey, said that fewer than half of surveyed doctors had received formal training in brain death certification during medical school

title: Punjab Anti-Gangster Task Force arrests key associate of two foreign-based fugitive gangsters Ludhiana
content: Preliminary investigation reveals that Singh has a criminal history and was earlier arrested with two illegal foreign-made pistols in January 2025 in Mohali, says DGP Gaurav Yadav

title: ‘For whom are they going?’: U.P. minister says peace restored in Bareilly, Samajwadi Party leaders planning visit to ‘vitiate atmosphere’
content: J.P.S. Rathore said opposition parties thought if Bareilly was engulfed in flames, they would make political gains, but the Uttar Pradesh administration’s strict action thwarted their plans

title: DCP among several injured in clash during idol immersion procession in Odisha's Cuttack, six held
content: The incident happened near Hatipokhari in the Daraghabazar area around 2 a.m., when the procession was heading to Debigara on the banks of the Kathajodi river, playing loud music, to which locals objected, they said

title: Kavalam panchayat lays stress on palliative services
content: Around 130 patients receive home care services every month. Wheelchairs and diapers are distributed to needy patients

title: KRRS leader Chukki Nanjundaswamy asks people to join hands to create loan-free villages in Karnataka
content: Quoting National Crime Records Bureau reports, Karnataka Rajya Raitha Sangha leader Chukki Nanjundaswamy said a farmer dies every hour

title: In pictures | Dussehra culminates with Ramlila
content: Ramlila celebrations in India sees the customary burning of the effigies of Ravana, Meghnad and Kumbhakaran. People thronged the venues to take a look at the age-old tradition of the theatre art.

title: Woman dies of rabies despite vaccination after stray dog attack
content: The 65-year-old Omallur native was bitten by the animal on the face while she was waiting at a bus stop on September 4. Health dept. checks whether the dog, which was later found dead, has bitten other people

title: Wayanad landslides: Centre should end injustice, neglect towards Kerala, says CM Pinarayi Vijayan
content: CM says after conducting a preliminary assessment, Kerala requested an emergency assistance of ₹1,202.12 crore. It has been a year and two months since the landslides, and no emergency assistance has been granted by the Centre

title: Political parties in Bihar express consensus over maximum two-phase election
content: Bihar BJP president demanded that women officers on duty should verify the identity of women voters wearing a burqa by matching their faces with their voter ID cards to ensure that only genuine voters cast their ballots

title: No talks until Maoists surrender: Amit Shah in Bastar
content: At a meeting in Jagdalpur in Bastar, the Home Minister urges the Maoists to lay down arms and take up the surrender-and-rehabilitation policy which is in place. He criticises ‘some people in Delhi’ for spreading ‘misinformation’ for years that Naxalism was birthed for the fight for development.

title: 5 arrested for putting up ‘I love Muhammad’ poster in Uttar Pradesh’s Meerut
content: According to police, the poster was put up on Friday night at the main intersection of Mawana town. On Saturday morning, locals objected to the poster and staged a protest

title: Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh: From Emergency to Ram Janmabhoomi movement (1973-1992)
content: Members of the RSS, jailed with socialists during the Emergency, helped form the Janata government in 1977 and played a role in bringing down a government in 1990

title: NDRF grants not being utilised for guarantee schemes: Karnataka CM
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah said the success of the guarantee schemes had rattled BJP leaders, and such statements were born out of a fear of losing out

title: Muslim Students Federation, SFI protest after teachers halt pro-Palestine mime show in Kerala school
content: Police say mime show was stopped during arts festival at a school in Kumbala, Kasaragod. Two teachers intervened and asked students to stop the performance before pulling down the stage curtains

title: Five booked in fake selection list scam linked to National Health Mission in Kashmir
content: They fraudulently approached volunteers, obtained their documents on the pretext of securing permanent engagement under NHM, and also collected money from them, said the spokesperson

title: Union Minister praises Naidu’s vision, launches auto drivers’ welfare scheme in Guntur
content: The Minister, clad in a khaki shirt, joined a massive rally of over 200 autos from TB Bungalow to the Revenue Kalyana Mandapam before inaugurating the scheme alongside local MLA Galla Madhavi

title: Karur stampede | Truth will come out and justice will prevail, says TVK leader Aadhav Arjuna
content: At the Dehradun airport, responding to queries from news agency ANI on the Madras High Court’s direction for an SIT probe, he said the party was working toward bringing justice in this matter

title: PM Modi to inaugurate Navi Mumbai International Airport on October 8
content: The Prime Minister will inaugurate the airport at 2.40 p.m. on October 8, and it will be operational from December

title: Minister Jagdish Vishwakarma named new Gujarat BJP chief
content: Jagdish Vishwakarma is currently serving as the Minister of State for co-operation, salt industries, MSME, cottage, khadi and rural industries.

title: PM Modi should announce relief for flood-hit farmers during Mumbai visit: Sanjay Raut
content: Shiv Sena MP Sanjay Raut, during his Mumbai visit, called for PM Modi to announce flood relief for Maharashtra farmers

title: Five more roads in Kerala to be upgraded to national highway status
content: In a communication to the State, NHAI has informed that procedures for preparing project document to develop five more new national highways have been initiated, says Public Works Minister Mohamed Riyas

title: TDB president P.S. Prasanth sees ‘error’ in entrusting Sabarimala artefacts to private person for repair in 2019
content: Prasanth says TDB will transfer the warranty from Unnikrishnan Potty to the board’s name, with High Court’s permission

title: Coffee Board opens special kiosk in Bengaluru to train women in coffee business
content: The kiosk is aimed at offering training and promoting entrepreneurship among women in various activities related to coffee growing, coffee processing and coffee retailing

title: Kerala’s Thiruvonam bumper lottery results announced, ticket number TH 577825 wins ₹25-crore jackpot
content: Thiruvonam Bumper saw record sales this year. Kerala State Lotteries department had printed 75 lakh tickets, of which all but one, which was defective, were sold

title: Ten militants arrested from three districts of Manipur
content: The successful operation has dealt a crippling setback to UKNA’s networks in Churachandpur and Jiribam, reaffirming Assam Rifles’ relentless commitment to peace and security in the region, the paramilitary force said

title: 'Made India bow': BJP guns for Sonia; says UPA govt was 'puppet in foreign hands'
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: Explosion at coaching centre in UP kills two and injures five others
content: With more than two decades of experience, writes extensively on crime stories. His professional portfolio extends to environmental journalism, wildlife protection initiatives and political developments. His thorough reporting on diverse social issues has contributed significantly to positive changes. title: Railway station targeted: Russia hits Ukrainian passenger train; at least 30 wounded
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world .

title: Seattle Mariners' crab helmet tops 2025 new ballpark grub
content: baseball teams are becoming more innovative and stepping up their food game in 2025 . the Seattle Mariners have a helmet full of crab claws for the postseason . they have an exclusive jaws milkshake and souvenir cup to celebrate the movie's 50th anniversary .

title: Air Force's alternate uniforms inspired by F-16 headline top threads for Week 6
content: the threads will be worn for the first time Saturday as air force faces a fellow service academy . the uniforms' connection with the F-16 is extensive, with tributes to the fighter jet everywhere from the helmet to the pants . details on the jersey include two patches for the player's name .

title: Don't be surprised if ... Cook leads RBs in season scoring, Daniels is top-five QB
content: field Yates has Deebo Samuel as a top-20 fantasy wide receiver in week 5 against the Chargers . all mentions of fantasy points are for PPR formats, unless otherwise noted . RB James Cook rushed for 16 touchdowns last season, but seven running backs scored more .

title: Knicks legends ride camels, 76ers go golfing: Top scenes from Abu Dhabi series
content: the new york Knicks and Philadelphia 76ers are in Abu Dhabi for a preseason doubleheader beginning Thursday . the trip marks the fourth year of the NBA's games in the united arab Emirates . they were greeted with singing from locals and a quick drink .

title: Haaland on pace to surpass Messi and Ronaldo's best seasons. Is that good for City?
content: pep Guardiola was trying to verbalize what made his team so different from their competitors . his wingers defended like defensive midfielders, his attacking midfielders facilitated the central runs of his wales . he said: "we play leftist football"

title: Why Alabama could move ahead early against Vandy
content: all odds by ESPN BET No. 16 Vanderbilt Commodores at no. 10 Alabama Crimson Tide at 3:30 p.m. ET, ABC Line: Alabama -10.5, 3-1 . a 5-0 win over alabama puts the team ahead of the playoffs . it's the kind of matchup that makes you pause before firing a bet .

title: Why Tommy Castellanos sets up FSU for success vs. Miami
content: a storm brewing in Tallahassee, and it's more than just the weather forecast . one team thrives on pressure, while the other thrives in it . what happens Saturday could reshape the entire ACC title race .

title: Top regression candidates for 2025-26: Geekie, Scheifele, more
content: last season, there were plenty of opportunities for regression, given what occurred during the 2023-24 season . candidates for regression include those most likely to see a 10+% drop in production, whether it's goals or points, based on their situations .

title: MLB playoff mega-preview: World Series odds, likely MVPs and more
content: the 2025 MLB playoffs are rolling along with all four game 1s starting Saturday . the playoffs will begin on saturday . all four teams will face each other in a series rematch . a team temperature is based on Bill James' formula for determining how "hot" or "cold" they are .

title: An all-time hater and a rivalry like no other: The Mannings vs. Florida
content: the longhorns have been a part of America's football consciousness for nearly 60 years . only one of the family's college football rivalries has included a spelling test, years of shade, and has spanned generations . the haters-in-chief, then as part of the redemptive end to the first college football run, was there .

title: The 29 games that will determine if the college football chaos continues
content: it feels like we know less about the college football landscape now than we did a month ago . it's into this murky world that we wade for Week 6 . last week boasted serious headliners that clarified the Big Ten's hierarchy .

title: 13 more games, 13 matchup previews: We have predictions, picks and wild stats
content: quarterbacks QBs Baker Mayfield and Sam Darnold will face off again in the Bucs-Seahawks matchup . sports reporters take you inside the locker room with the best thing they heard this week . fantasy analyst Eric Moody shares fantasy football intel . we also have football power index (FPI) matchup quality ratings .

title: 'He fought too many times': How the loss to Ankalaev forced Pereira to change
content: former middleweight and then-light heavyweight champion Alex Pereira complained about how he felt ahead of his title defense . pereira surrendered the light heavyweight championship to Magomed Ankalaev by unanimous decision in an eff . he is now one of the world's most dominant champions of all time .

title: How the Aces defeated the Mercury
content: the no. 2 Las Vegas Aces beat the Phoenix Mercury 89-86 in game 1 of the 2025 WNBA Finals on friday . Dana Evans scored 21 points off the bench, matching the game high of four-time MVP A'ja Wilson and Mercury star Kahleah Copper . jewell Loyd also added 18 points, making them the first pair of teammates with at least 15 points as reserves in a Finals game since 2019 .

title: Rollins creates more animosity with Cody, Orton
content: seth Rollins continues to question himself and be fueled by his desire for revenge and validation . the vision def. cody Rhodes and Randy Orton defeated Rhodes . a stomp on Orton was an interesting end because it adds another layer of animosity .

title: Women's Bracketology: UConn projects as top overall seed with one month to season
content: a month before the 2025-26 season opens, there's a fresh look at what may look like . if we last forecasted the bracket in April, the UConn Huskies had just been crowned champions . it's the big news as we enter the final months before the season .
